name: Timorous Deep
description: Once a secret laboratory to develop an army, the city of Gorowyn is now home to the sarnak race. Nestled within the belly of an extinct volcano, the sarnak work to discover the mysterious origins of their creation, and wage war against the aggressive Haoaeran race.

npcs.name: Aimee
utterances: Is not easy, being ratongas around heres!
Ratongas should never have come outs from the Underfoots, is too depressing out heres
I's so depressed ... even cheese doesn't helps!

npcs.name: Al'Zeem
utterances: There is much to study here.  Not only do the sarnak have a unique view of the world, but they also have the most unusual magical devices within their own city.

npcs.name: Behry Wavehand
utterances: I'm not here to provide conversation for bored passersby.  Be on your way.

npcs.name: Bhaltair Tanicus
utterances: Have yourself a happy Frostfell!

npcs.name: Burrin Vor'Ork
utterances: Welcome to Gorowyn.

npcs.name: Chelzyk Gi'rul
utterances: Greetings traveler, how can I assist you today?

npcs.name: Dima Fahim
utterances: Enjoy the festivities!

npcs.name: a disreputable boatman
utterances: I've no business with you today.

npcs.name: Dughall Macleod
utterances: Merry Frostfell!

npcs.name: Eredykil Zum'tok
utterances: Books and scrolls for sale!

npcs.name: Finnes Larcious
utterances: Ha ha!  I should be able to earn a years worth of wages back in Freeport selling even a few of these trinkets I found here!

npcs.name: Gerd Noale
utterances: I've been cursed, I can't drink without feeling horrible. Oh, my stomach.

npcs.name: Gh'lad Tydingz Gigglegibber
utterances: You bring back the items I need, then I will be of making more gifts.  Hurry!

npcs.name: Gutten Gigglegibber
utterances: Happy Frostfell for you!  Yes, yes!  You wants one of Gutten's special holiday trees.
Yes!  Course you do!  You no chop or bought such trees anywhere like Gutten's.
You want frosty Frostfell tree!
This Gigglegibber make happy to deal make with you!  Frostfell days of happy time and sharing happy smiles with others.  You share happy with others in city.
Perfect good!  You put up sparklies, color bright bits, in the city!
Yes, yes!  You grab the badger by the tail!  Decorate the city dark areas.  I gives you sparklies and you puts them  in blah spots.

npcs.name: a Haoaeran archivist
utterances: Mayday... mayday...
Hostile at twelve o'clock!

npcs.name: a Haoaeran fisher
utterances: Mayday... mayday...
I'm taking this one down!

npcs.name: a Haoaeran keeneye
utterances: Mayday... mayday...

npcs.name: a Haoaeran proven
utterances: Mayday... mayday...
I'm taking this one down!

npcs.name: a Haoaeran tapper
utterances: Mayday... mayday...

npcs.name: Joren Kalth
utterances: Hello! You look like a capable adventurer, come speak with me!

npcs.name: Kagin Oathsmasher
utterances: If I was in yer boots, and sober, I'd venture o'er to Antonica and see Brell's avatar for meself.

npcs.name: Lesharra
utterances: From the old stories I have heard of the sarnak race, I would have expected a brutal, sadistic society here.  However, these creatures are far from that... at least from what I have seen.

npcs.name: Nariib
utterances: Looking for anything in particular?

npcs.name: Sarheid
utterances: There must be lost magic knowledge in abundance on these islands, and on the continent beyond.

npcs.name: Smurg Fleshreaper
utterances: Hey Sailor!  Got some free time?
That's too bad.
Oh, yes!  He was that handsome bearded one the other day.
Enjoy your travels, Sailor.

npcs.name: Tadal Blurdcog
utterances: Ah, the machines here are fantastic!  Genuine feats of engineering, to be sure.  I find it hard to believe that a gnome had nothing to do with their design!

npcs.name: Tarcha Niba'dn
utterances: My greetings to you!  May I be of service?
Affirmative.  My path has crossed with that of the outlander, Gilin Rockbreath.  Why do you inquire about him?
Then I wish you the best of luck, <player name>.
May I be of further service to you, <player name>?

npcs.name: Thulkanil Shai'lin
utterances: Thank you for your service to the City of Gorowyn.

npcs.name: Verkaera Myr'zok
utterances: I have mounts brought from across the world.  Take a look, and see if you find one that you might like.

npcs.name: Welza Bittlescope
utterances: Much to see, much to do!  And the scenery here is just beautiful, too!
